name: Tears in Heaven
author: Eric Clapton
text:
Wo[E]uld you [H/Es]know my n[C#mi]ame if[A] I s[E]aw you in[H] Heaven
Wo[E]uld it b[H/Es]e the sam[C#mi]e if[A] I s[E]aw you in[H] Heaven

R:
[C#mi]I must be st[As/C]rong a[Hmi]nd carry o[C#]n
Cause I[F#mi] know I don't[H7sus] belon[H7]g here in [E]heav[H/Es]en
[C#mi, E, A, H7sus, H7, E]


Bridge:
Ti[G]me can b[D/F]ring you d[Emi]own Time can b[A]end your kn[D]ees[A, Hmi, A, D ]
Ti[G]me can b[D/F]reak your [Emi]heart Have you [A]beggin p[D]lease be[DA]ggin p[H]lease

[E, H/Es, C#mi, A, E, H]
[E, H/Es, C#mi, A, E, H]

[C#mi]Beyond the do[As/C]or the[Hmi]re's peace I'm [C#]sure
And I [F#mi]know there'll be no [H]more tears in [E]heaven...

Wo[E]uld you [H/Es]know my n[C#mi]ame if[A] I s[E]aw you in[H] Heaven
Wo[E]uld it fe[H/Es]el the sam[C#mi]e if[A] I s[E]aw you in[H] Heaven

R:
[C#mi]I must be st[As/C]rong a[Hmi]nd carry o[C#]n
Cause I[F#mi] know I don't[H7sus] belon[H7]g here in [E]heav[H/Es]en
